dict.acceptation: 提议，建议( propose的过去式和过去分词 )；打算；提供（解释）；提出（行动，计划或供表决的方案等）；

sent.orig: In 2001, I proposed massive tax cuts, but I also proposed to rein in spending.
sent.trans: 2001年，我建议大规模减税，但我也建议控制支出。

sent.orig: By use of a modified BFGS formula proposed by Li-Fukushima (2001), Li-Qi(2003)proposed a MBFGS-trust region method.
sent.trans: Li-Qi(2003)将Li-Fukushima(2001)提出的修正BFGS公式应用于信赖域算法，提出了MBFGS-信赖域算法。

sent.orig: Application results of the proposed method in large-area grid show that the proposed method is feasible.
sent.trans: 实际大区电网的应用结果表明了该方法的可行性。

sent.orig: The proposed allocation as announced was fact something proposed before but no action so far.
sent.trans: 从所宣布的拨款，事实上之前已经在国会里提出，但是迄今仍然没有采取任何行动。

sent.orig: We proposed fabricating polymer segmented cladding fiber by bicomponent spinning is proposed.
sent.trans: 提出了采用复合纺丝法制备瓣状聚合物光纤的新思路。
